subject: Pedal issue
description_text: Hello i am having an issue with the pedal & control box. Not sure if both are connected but my throttle randomly wont work. Then my control box keeps letting the brake & throttle input register in game even though i have deadzone set to 7. I still get both showing activation in game

conversations.body_text: Hi Javier Tellez,    First, please make sure you are using a USB 3.0 (blue) port, and avoid connecting the device through a USB hub. Additionally, please refer to the link below and use any wire to connect the computer case to a screw on the controller box. You may also connect any screw on the controller box to any screw on the pedal.  The reason for this is that some computer cases are not properly grounded to the household earth, which may cause grounding issues and affect device stability.     https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
